thread.title: USAA Switching Credit, Debit Cards to Visa From MasterCard - WSJ
thread.title_full: USAA Switching Credit, Debit Cards to Visa From MasterCard - WSJ

author: Robin Sidel
title: USAA Switching Credit, Debit Cards to Visa From MasterCard - WSJ
text:
USAA, one of the nationâ€™s largest issuers of debit cards and credit cards, is switching its portfolio to Visa Inc., representing a blow for longtime partner MasterCard Inc. which processed transactions on its network for roughly 30 years.
The move is the latest in a continuing scramble of large portfolios that are hotly sought-after by Visa, MasterCard and American Express Co. among issuers and networks. It is relatively rare,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
